resources.string:
Instructions:

• Tap 5 times on the top-left corner to access settings

Motion Detection:
• Screen turns ON when motion is detected in front of camera
• Screen turns OFF after no motion for the set delay

Proximity Sensor:
• Wave to Wake: Wave hand to turn screen on
• Wave to Toggle: Wave to switch screen on/off
• Near = Off: Screen off when object is near

Security:
• Enable Device Admin for full screen lock control
• Set a PIN code to exit kiosk mode
